mapper.select: SELECT id, unique_id, goods_id, into_stock_number, into_stock_price, is_finished, supplier_name, create_time, edit_time FROM pssm_into_stock_list
SELECT id, unique_id, goods_id, into_stock_number, into_stock_price, is_finished, supplier_name, create_time, edit_time FROM pssm_into_stock_list WHERE id = #{targetItem.id}
